text: Ferenc Kun (24 August 1930 - 6 March 2009) was a Hungarian sports shooter. He competed in the 25 metre pistol event at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2009 deaths Category:Hungarian male sport shooters Category:Olympic shooters of Hungary Category:Shooters at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Budapest
title: Ferenc Kun
